title: How to Leave a Channel on Telegram

steps.title: Open the “Telegram” app.
steps.content: Open the “Telegram” app. It's a round icon depicting a paper flight in blue background. If you can't find it, open the Start menu by pressing on the Windows button and search for “Telegram”.

steps.title: Right-click on the channel you want to leave.
steps.content: Right-click on the channel you want to leave. You can see your friends and channels on the left side of the app. A context menu will show up when you right-click on it.

steps.title: Select Leave channel from the menu.
steps.content: Select Leave channel from the menu. A confirmation box will pop up on your screen.

steps.title: Leave the channel.
steps.content: Leave the channel. Click the LEAVE option from the dialog box to confirm your action. The channel will disappear from your list. That's it! Alternatively, open a channel and navigate to the “Channel Info” section. Then, click on the Leave channel option at the bottom and confirm your action.

steps.title: Launch the Telegram app.
steps.content: Launch the Telegram app. It's a round icon depicting a paper flight in blue background. You can usually find it in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap and hold the channel you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap and hold the channel you want to leave. A menu panel will show up at the bottom.

steps.title: Tap on Leave channel.
steps.content: Tap on Leave channel . It will be the last option in the list. You will see a dialog box open up.

steps.title: Tap on the OK option to confirm your action.
steps.content: Tap on the OK option to confirm your action. You can also find the “Leave channel” option on the "About" section of a Telegram channel. That's it!
